author: NA Not Active
comment: Nice idea, but can't change clock / see Batt / weather / date etc. Litually digital ambient clock, rock it to show video clip with small digital clock at top and stops again. Needs more options to make it shine but as before nice idea... Just finish it off with optional different analogue/digital designs and widgets like Batt or date or weather please

author: Tyler French
comment: I love this watch face, the only problem I am having is only being able to upload 1 gif. I really like the idea of this though.

author: Blake Hershberger
comment: It wont change from nyan cat and i keep trying and waiting but nothings happening even after i tried reinstalling it
title: Wont work

author: Peter Isachsen
comment: Works good. I was a little concerned about battery life, but it doesn't seem to be so much. I would like to have the choice of more fonts and showing date and battery life

author: Tim Schuckelt
comment: It's pretty cool to use GIFs as a Watch Face.

author: Hemanth Vlogs
comment: It is showing watch is connected and the watch and phone are connected to same wifi network but when i change the video ,it is updating on app watch screen but not updating on watch. Only works if i uninstall and install and again for next video vice versa. Please update the issue , its a great app.

title: Updated Review (Using Moto 360 2nd gen)
